title: Fluence
description:
Fluence Website Redesign

This case study details the redesign of the Fluence website, focusing on enhancing user experience, improving engagement, and effectively communicating the firm's value proposition to investors and prospective clients.

Problem Statement

The original Fluence website suffered from poor user engagement, complex navigation, and an outdated design. Users struggled to find information and understand Fluence's services, leading to high bounce rates and low conversions.

Objectives & Goals

- Increase user engagement (time on site, scroll depth) by 30%
- Reduce bounce rate by 20%
- Improve conversion rate (contact form submissions) by 25%
- Enhance overall user satisfaction based on post-launch surveys

Research & Insights

I conducted competitive analysis, studied Google Analytics data, and interviewed potential clients. Key findings included:
- Lack of clear calls-to-action
- Inconsistent branding
- Overwhelming homepage content
- Difficulty understanding Fluence’s unique value proposition

Ideation & Concept Development

I explored different design approaches, focusing on a modern aesthetic with clear visual hierarchy and interactive elements. Scroll-triggered animations were incorporated to enhance engagement.

Design Process

- Wireframing: Simplified information architecture, logical navigation flow.
- Prototyping: Interactive Figma prototypes for usability testing and refinement.
- Visual Design: Modern, clean layout with a sophisticated color palette, custom typography, and high-quality imagery.
- Usability Testing: Conducted multiple rounds of testing with target users to validate and improve the design.

Challenges & Solutions

Balancing content-rich design with simplicity was a challenge. I solved this through effective visual hierarchy, interactive elements, and prioritizing key information.

Final Outcome

The redesigned Fluence website successfully improved engagement, clarity, and usability. Key improvements:
- 35% increase in user engagement
- 22% decrease in bounce rate
- 28% increase in contact form conversions
- Positive user feedback on ease of navigation and aesthetics

Learnings & Reflections

This project reinforced the importance of user research, iterative design, and continuous testing. Moving forward, I aim to enhance collaboration with stakeholders and incorporate user feedback throughout the process.

Conclusion

The Fluence website redesign was a success, transforming an outdated site into a modern, intuitive platform. Future iterations will focus on continuous improvement through user feedback and analytics.

Here's the link to live website - Fluence
excerpt: Fluence is an independent financial advisory firm founded by six associates with over a decade of common experience in the private banking and asset management sectors. The firm aims to provide personalized, high-performing, and digitalized services to its clients while reducing costs and increasing agility. Fluence’s approach is based on the realization of each investor’s personal objectives.

title: MemoriaCall
description:
Current Job

As a Senior UI/UX Designer, I am currently developing a SaaS-based product called MemoriaCall. MemoriaCall is a video conferencing platform that offers an all-in-one meeting platform with searchable audio transcript, in-app document sharing, storage, and playback. MemoriaCall is powered by OpenAI’s ChatGPT, which is a state-of-the-art language model that can generate human-like responses to text inputs. You can learn more about MemoriaCall and see all the live updates for the app on their website - memoriacall.com.
excerpt: MemoriaCall is a video conferencing platform that offers a feature set that combines essential collaborative features such as in-app file sharing, in-app file storage, and playback. It provides an all-in-one meeting platform with searchable audio transcript, in-app document sharing, storage, and playback. MemoriaCall is powered by OpenAI’s ChatGPT, which is a state-of-the-art language model that can generate human-like responses to text inputs. MemoriaCall is a secure, simple, and smart video conferencing platform that is revolutionizing the game.

title: Loooop Studios
description:
Web Development

Recently, I had a chance to design a website that would be not just creative, but also visually stunning and attention-grabbing.

I was fortunate enough to be given the opportunity to turn that dream into a reality, and I couldn't be more excited to share my latest collaboration with an incredible artist who possesses a remarkable talent for his craft.

I am grateful for the chance to have developed the website for Loooop Studios and am thrilled to announce the official launch of his website, loooop.studio. It was an absolute pleasure working with such a talented artist, and I hope I have done justice to his artwork, his vision, and helped enhance its beauty.

As a designer, I am always on the lookout for ways to push my creative boundaries and to collaborate with talented individuals to create something truly remarkable. This project has been a testament to that pursuit, and I am proud to have been a part of it.

Thank you once again to Stephane AKA DFT for trusting me with his vision and allowing me to help bring it to life. I look forward to more exciting collaborations in the future.
excerpt: Loooop Studio is a creative studio that specializes in one-line art. They create unique content from illustration and icon design to animation. They have collaborated with global brands such as Adidas, Google, Hermès, Nike, and Facebook. You can find more information about them at loooop.studio/about.

title: Schindler
description:
Schindler Challenge

Schindler India has been honoured with two prestigious awards for their outstanding marketing initiatives at the Realty+ Interior and Exterior Awards 2020.

We are grateful to Realty+ for recognizing our efforts.

The awards acknowledge the innovative marketing campaigns by Schindler India throughout 2020 that were unique in concept, creative in approach, and effective in communication.

Schindler India has won the Marketing Campaign of the Year award for the Schindler Challenge Campaign and the Marketer of the Year award under the leadership of Mr. Ashok Ramachandran for their engaging 360° marketing initiatives throughout 2020.

The campaigns included the Schindler Challenge, the Freedom Week Campaign, the Jugaad Campaign, and the ongoing Extra campaign.

The year 2020 witnessed an exciting and engaging marketing calendar for Schindler India with visionary and innovative campaigns designed around gamification, augmented reality, and a positive and fun element as an engaging tool.

As a team member, I had the privilege of contributing to the development of this campaign and creating the Instagram filter used in the awareness campaign.
excerpt: Schindler Group is a Swiss company that provides elevators, escalators, and related services. It was founded in 1874 and its innovative and environmentally-friendly access and transit-management systems make an important contribution to mobility in urban societies. Schindler manufactures, installs, services, and modernizes elevators, escalators, and moving walks for almost every type of building. Schindler’s dividend policy is earnings-related and provides for a payout ratio of 35% to 65% of net profit attributable to shareholders of Schindler Holding Ltd.

title: Digital Art
description: Archived
excerpt: One of the things I did during the pandemic was to learn more about NFTs and how they work. NFTs are non-fungible tokens that can represent unique digital assets on a blockchain. I was fascinated by this concept and decided to create some digital artworks for my own NFT collection. I used various tools and techniques to express my creativity and vision through digital art.
